sqlMap.insert: insert into ordering (order_code, user_code, order_name, order_phone, order_addr1, order_addr2, order_postCode1, order_postCode2, order_memo, order_used_mileage, order_state, reg_id, reg_date, reg_ip, upd_id, upd_date, upd_ip) values (#orderCode#, #userCode#, #orderName#, #orderPhone#, #orderAddr1#, #orderAddr2#, #orderPostCode1#, #orderPostCode2#, #orderMemo#, #orderUsedMileage#, #orderState#, #regId#, sysdate(), #regIp#, #updId#, sysdate(), #updIp#)

insert into order_info(order_info_code, order_code, item_code, order_item_amount, order_item_recom, order_item_market_price, order_item_sell_price, order_item_purchase_price, discount_reason_code) values(CONCAT("OI",LPAD((SELECT GET_SEQ('ORDER_CODE')), 10, '0')), #orderCode#, #itemCode#, #orderItemAmount#, #orderItemRecom#, #orderItemMarketPrice#, #orderItemSellPrice#, #orderItemPurchasePrice#, #discountReasonCode#)
sqlMap.select: SELECT CONCAT("OR",LPAD((SELECT GET_SEQ('ORDER_CODE')), 10, '0')) as orderCode FROM DUAL
sqlMap.update: update order_info set ORDER_ITEM_VERIFY = 'Y' WHERE ORDER_INFO_CODE = #orderInfoCode#
sqlMap.select: select a.REG_DATE as regDate, ORDER_STATE as orderState, b.ORDER_ITEM_SELL_PRICE as orderItemSellPrice, b.ORDER_ITEM_RECOM as orderItemRecom, b.ORDER_ITEM_VERIFY as orderItemVerify, b.ORDER_ITEM_AMOUNT as orderItemAmount, c.ITEM_PIC_PATH as itemPicPath, c.ITEM_PIC_SAVENAME as itemPicSaveName, c.item_name as itemName, c.ITEM_DETAIL_INFO as itemDetailInfo, b.ORDER_INFO_CODE as orderInfoCode FROM ordering a, order_info b, item c WHERE a.ORDER_CODE = b.ORDER_CODE AND b.item_code = c.ITEM_CODE AND a.USER_CODE = #myUserCode#
